content.query:
-------------------------
--Creating calendar view
-------------------------
CREATE VIEW gold.calendar
AS
SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accstokad.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )as query1;


-------------------------
--Creating customers view
-------------------------
CREATE VIEW gold.customers
AS
SELECT 
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accstokad.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Customers/',
        FORMAT= 'PARQUET'
    )query1;
